page.title: 07A Child's Day
page.content: At 7.30am I wake up. I get dressed and have my breakfast. I go to Holbury School at 8.30am, and we begin working after the register. At 10.15am we go outside to play until 10.30am. We have assembly until 11.00am. After more work we have lunch and at 1.00pm we begin working again. Sometimes we have outdoor games. At 2.15pm we have play until 2.30pm. I normally play skipping or marbles. Then we work until 3.00 pm and then we have a story until hometime which is 3.30pm. I walk home and have a drink and get changed and go out to play. Tea is at 5.30pm and after tea I go to Guides. We play rounders and we do other things. At 8.00pm it finshes, and I get home at 8.30pm. I have a bath and get undressed and get to sleep at 10.00pm.
